KCNH2.description: Potassium voltage-gated channel subfamily H member 2 (IKr)
KCNH2.disease: Long QT syndrome type 2, Short QT syndrome

KCNQ1.description: Potassium voltage-gated channel subfamily Q member 1 (IKs)
KCNQ1.disease: Long QT syndrome type 1, Jervell Lange-Nielsen syndrome

SCN5A.disease: Long QT syndrome type 3, Brugada syndrome, cardiac conduction disease

KCNE1.description: Potassium voltage-gated channel subfamily E member 1 (IKs auxiliary)
KCNE1.disease: Long QT syndrome type 5, Jervell Lange-Nielsen syndrome

KCNE2.description: Potassium voltage-gated channel subfamily E member 2 (IKr auxiliary)

CACNA1C.description: Calcium voltage-gated channel subunit alpha1 C (ICaL)
CACNA1C.disease: Timothy syndrome, Long QT syndrome type 8, Brugada

KCNJ2.description: Potassium inwardly rectifying channel subfamily J member 2 (IK1)
KCNJ2.disease: Andersen-Tawil syndrome, Short QT syndrome type 3
